Klasse Board

java.lang.Object
model.game.board.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the game board. The board holds a 3D structure of tiles, tracks robot positions, and provides methods to move robots and activate tile effects (e.g. conveyors, push panels, gears, lasers).

    Constructs a board with the specified number of rows and columns.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Board

      public Board(int rows, int cols)
      Constructs a board with the specified number of rows and columns.
      Parameter:
      rows - the number of rows on the board
      cols - the number of columns on the board

  • Methodendetails

    • setLogger

      public void setLogger(Logger log)

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard(List<List<List<Tile>>> map)
      Initializes the board’s map and populates internal lists for special tiles.
      Parameter:
      map - the board’s map organized as rows, columns, and lists of tiles

    • moveRobot

      public void moveRobot(Robot robot, Direction directionOfMovement)
      Moves the given robot in the specified direction. Checks boundaries, pits, antennas, walls, and other robots before updating its position. If all checks pass, the robot is placed in the new cell and a movement notification is sent.
      Parameter:
      robot - the robot to move
      directionOfMovement - the direction in which to move the robot

    • calculateNewCoordinates

      public int[] calculateNewCoordinates(int currentRow, int currentCol, Direction directionOfMovement)
      Calculates the new board coordinates when moving from a given cell in a specified direction.
      Parameter:
      currentRow - the current row index
      currentCol - the current column index
      directionOfMovement - the direction to move
      Gibt zurück:
      an array where index 0 is the new row and index 1 is the new column

    • activateTiles

      public void activateTiles(int currentRegister)
      Activates the effects of all board tiles.
      Parameter:
      currentRegister - the current register

    • activateGears

      public void activateGears()
      Activates all gear tiles on the game board.

    • activatePushPanels

      public void activatePushPanels(int currentRegister)
      Activates all push panel tiles for the given register phase. For each push panel with a robot, the panel’s push effect is triggered.
      Parameter:
      currentRegister - the register phase during which push panels activate

    • activateLasers

      public void activateLasers()
      Activates wall lasers. Fires a laser from each starting position in its set direction.

    • activateRobotLasers

      public void activateRobotLasers()
      Activates lasers fired by robots. For each robot, fires a laser in its facing direction (and rear laser if applicable).

    • isWithinBounds

      public boolean isWithinBounds(int row, int col)
      Checks whether the given row and column are within the boards boundaries.
      Parameter:
      row - the row index to check
      col - the column index to check
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the position is within bounds; false otherwise

    • placeRobot

      public void placeRobot(Robot robot, int row, int col)
      Updates the position of the given robot on the game board. Replaces the robot's current position with the specified row and col.
      Parameter:
      robot - the robot to be placed
      row - the row index of the new position
      col - the column index of the new position

    • determinePriority

      public List<Player> determinePriority()
      Determines which player has the highest priority based on their robot's distance and angle relative to the antenna.
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of players sorted by priority (closest and best aligned come first)

    • calculateDistance

      public int calculateDistance(int[] pos1, int[] pos2)
      Calculates the Manhattan distance between two positions on the game board.

      Manhattan distance is the sum of the absolute differences of their row and column indices.

      Parameter:
      pos1 - The first position as an array where pos1[0] is the row and pos1[1] is the column.
      pos2 - The second position as an array where pos2[0] is the row and pos2[1] is the column.
      Gibt zurück:
      The Manhattan distance between pos1 and pos2.

    • prepareReboot

      public void prepareReboot(Robot robot, String isOnBoard)
      Reboots the robot by locating a suitable RebootTokenTile matching the given board status. If no appropriate tile is found or the tile is blocked, an alternative reboot location is sought.
      Parameter:
      robot - the robot to reboot
      isOnBoard - the board identifier used to match the reboot tile

    • activateConveyorBelts

      public void activateConveyorBelts()
      Activates all conveyor belts in two phases (speed 2 then speed 1). Moves robots along the belts and adjusts their orientation when switching directions.

    • getCheckpoints

      public int getCheckpoints()

    • isOnBoard

      public String isOnBoard(Robot robot)

    • getRobotsInRadius

      public List<Robot> getRobotsInRadius(Robot robot)

    • getMap

      public List<List<List<Tile>>> getMap()

    • getRobotPositions

      public Position getRobotPositions(Robot robot)

    • clearRobotPositions

      public void clearRobotPositions()

    • getTilesAtPosition

      public List<Tile> getTilesAtPosition(Position position)

    • isLaserTileAt

      public boolean isLaserTileAt(Position position)

    • isCheckpointTile

      public boolean isCheckpointTile(Position position)

    • isEnergySpaceTile

      public boolean isEnergySpaceTile(Position position)

    • moveCheckpointsOnConveyorBelts

      public void moveCheckpointsOnConveyorBelts()
      Activates all conveyor belts in two phases. Moves robots along the belts and adjusts their orientation when switching directions.
